reasons_to_visit.details: Film, storytelling, and jazz festivals animate parks and courtyards.
DRY roads and long daylight make Glencoe and Cairngorms accessible.

reasons_to_reconsider.details: Summer pricing kicks in from mid-June.

weather.precipitation: Light showers with bright warm spells.
weather.general_tips: Carry sunscreen-UV levels spike despite cool breezes.

tourism_level.crowds: Moderate; tour groups increase toward mid-month.
tourism_level.pricing: Hotels trending upwards but still below August peak.

events_holidays.name: Edinburgh International Film Festival
events_holidays.description: Premieres and retrospectives across city cinemas.

unique_experiences.description: Views toward the Pentlands as city lights twinkle.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Bring head torch for descent; pack picnic.

unique_experiences.description: Paddle around Craigleith island with puffin sightings.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Wear provided drysuit; trips cancel in high winds.

unique_experiences.description: Live DJs and rotating vendors in Leith.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Contactless payments preferred; sheltered seating limited.

weather.precipitation: Mostly dry with occasional haar drifting inland.
weather.general_tips: Pack light layers; evenings cool near the Forth.

tourism_level.crowds: High as schools break up and cruise ships dock.

events_holidays.name: Summer solstice
events_holidays.description: Locals gather on Calton Hill and Portobello for sunset gatherings.
events_holidays.notes: Expect busier hills and limited parking.

unique_experiences.description: Watch classics under the castle backdrop.
4x4 tours spot red deer and grouse with expert guides.
unique_experiences.practical_tips: Depart early; booking essential for small vehicles.
